snippet.title: Love Shore - Official Story Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2021
snippet.description:
Love Shore is set in a sci-fi dystopic future, play as either Farah or Sam in this narrative-driven adventure.

#GameTrailers #Gaming #SummerOfGaming
